item.title: L’Oreal Cell BioPrint analyzes your skin in five minutes
item.description: L’Oréal Groupe announced at CES 2025 the L’Oréal Cell BioPrint, a hardware device that provides customized skin analysis in just five minutes.

item.title: Samsung spreads Vision AI across its 2025 TV portfolio
item.description: For this year’s lineup, Samsung said that AI will come to life in more ways than just great picture quality. The company is introducing AI-backed expe...

item.title: Halliday unveils AI smart glasses with lens-free AR viewing
item.description: Halliday has come up with eyewear we didn't know we needed: smart glasses with no lenses. Welcome to the age of AI smart glasses.

item.title: Timekettle unveils Babel OS for AI simultaneous interpretation in language translation earbuds
item.description: Timekettle has unveiled the Babel OS, its first-ever operating system designed to redefine its language translation earbuds.

item.title: Eli Health introduces Hormometer to test your hormones on a smartphone
item.description: This is how smart your smartphone is getting. Now it will be able to analyze your saliva and do a real-time hormone test.
